text: Al-Urwa or Al-Urwah (, The Bond) may refer to: * Al-Urwah al-Wuthqa, 19th- century pan-Islamic journal. * Al-Urwah al-Wuthqa (book), a Shi'i book of Islamic jurisprudence. * Al-Urwa, a US propaganda magazine published in the 1950s. ==See also== * Urwa (disambiguation)
title: Al-Urwa (disambiguation)
